channel.title: My story
channel.description:
Now, I know a lot of you have dubbed me as a faggot for what I did, when I removed frank_'s moderation. I realize I did the wrong thing, and broke a lot of rules. All I ask for is that I be left alone after it, and that this whole situation just die. I just do not see eye-to-eye on a few things.
1) I could of sworn Silab was involved in posting an infected keylogger, and wasn't fully banned. Most people who do that instantly receive a full-time ban. She was granted a second/third chance, why can I not have the same privilege. 2) I'd already resolved this with Lothy, and we ended up beginning a new server base for the 508 client, just as it never happened. However, he made sure I understood that I had to tow the line from now on, fine with me. I did the wrong thing, and understand I deserve to be punishment. 3) Despite the amount of moderation I did on MoparScape, I had never done it before (other than using my warning powers in the programming section once, but that was under the grant of Niall).
Overall, yes me being demoted was justified. I would of done the same thing, but I do believe I am owed a second chance. If not, fine with me. I do know that life is sometime not fair, and I will have to accept it and move on. It probably didn't help that Moparisthebest looked down at me as a moderator from day one, and always thought of myself as an elitist.

item.title: My story
item.dc:creator: @silabsoft RuneAgent
item.description:
@silabsoft wrote:

[quote=“Ollie, post:14, topic:248172”][quote author=Pwnd link=topic=327213.msg2562954#msg2562954 date=1228248845]
She only sticks around for publicity, lul!
[/quote]

fix’t

Niall is right, unfortunately for Yz, he seems like a nice fella but you cannot disobey the rules. what kind of impression would it leave if you got away with it? get mod and unmute your friends! with no consequences![/quote]

Read full topic

item.description:

what kind of impression would it leave if you got away with it? get mod and unmute your friends! with no consequences!

Yeah that would be totally wrong!

Er… wait… hrmph

item.title: My story
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

[quote=“Greeny, post:10, topic:248172”][quote author=Niall link=topic=327213.msg2562552#msg2562552 date=1228222036]

you did nothing half of the other moderators haven’t done before.

To put it simply, one of the rules when you reach senior mscp moderator, and GMOD is, do not remove another moderator’s punishment without consulting them first, and one of the senior moparscape moderator’s specific rules is not to use their warning or banning powers for MITB related matters unless permission is given, Yz ignored both these rules in removing Frank’s moderation status.
[/quote]

You tell me like it hasn’t been abused before…[/quote]

As far as I know, it hasn’t.

Read full topic

item.title: My story
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

[quote=“davidude36, post:8, topic:248172”]Silab was demodded for like 2 years wasn’t she? She showed she was still dedicated by sticking around in that time and eventually worked her way back up?

Plus I thought it wasn’t her original idea to do the keylogger, she just took some of the profit from the accounts or something along those lines.

Anyway bottom line is; yz85racer you did wrong and you suffered the punishment, you understand that. If you prove you are still commited and learned from your mistakes I’m sure in time you could work your way back to a staffer again…

That’s all there really is?[/quote]
She stuck around for the money.

Read full topic

item.title: My story
item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

Silab was demodded for like 2 years wasn’t she? She showed she was still dedicated by sticking around in that time and eventually worked her way back up?

Plus I thought it wasn’t her original idea to do the keylogger, she just took some of the profit from the accounts or something along those lines.

Anyway bottom line is; yz85racer you did wrong and you suffered the punishment, you understand that. If you prove you are still commited and learned from your mistakes I’m sure in time you could work your way back to a staffer again…

That’s all there really is?

you did nothing half of the other moderators haven’t done before.

To put it simply, one of the rules when you reach senior mscp moderator, and GMOD is, do not remove another moderator’s punishment without consulting them first, and one of the senior moparscape moderator’s specific rules is not to use their warning or banning powers for MITB related matters unless permission is given, Yz ignored both these rules in removing Frank’s moderation status.

item.title: My story
item.dc:creator: @Greeny Greeny
item.description:
@Greeny wrote:

Don’t take it so easily Yz, you did nothing half of the other moderators haven’t done before.

Demodding you was stupid, they should have removed dot powers AT MOST.

I think you did more than anyone else would have done by owning up, I think it’s unfair they demod you when countless staff have removed warnings/mutes etc early on me and many others.

If you keep Yz demodded but allow all the other staff to stay on, and turn a blind eye then you are just as fucking elitist as the rest of us and as far as I’m concerned can go fuck yourselves.

Read full topic

item.title: My story
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

[quote=“Lothy, post:4, topic:248172”]I didn’t go as far as stripping your powers because it had to be put to discussion. It was agreed upon that you should retain your ability to access the site along with all you had achieved as a regular member (ie, your Community Member status and your remaining non-moderator awards). Your position as a moderator however has been revoked.

My understanding is that you are more than welcome to hang around as a non-staff member simply because you had the decency not to screw any of us around by making us find out who was responsible the hard way.[/quote]
If I didn’t confess apparently it was impossible to find out, according to someone who I actually cannot remember at this time.

Read full topic

item.title: My story
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

I didn’t go as far as stripping your powers because it had to be put to discussion. It was agreed upon that you should retain your ability to access the site along with all you had achieved as a regular member (ie, your Community Member status and your remaining non-moderator awards). Your position as a moderator however has been revoked.

My understanding is that you are more than welcome to hang around as a non-staff member simply because you had the decency not to screw any of us around by making us find out who was responsible the hard way.

Read full topic
